title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Based on Antiviral Drug Development Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model the E2 glycoprotein structure of the VEEV virus and analyze its binding mechanisms through 3D simulation.
Learners can design a protocol to evaluate the binding affinity of AI-generated single-domain antibodies (sdAb) using mathematical statistical techniques.
Learners can build a mathematical model to predict therapeutic effects based on ELISA and virus neutralization experiment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
